column4: something in Ubuntu uses my connection for updates or god knows what when I don't want it to. It chokes out my dialup connection and fucks up what I'm doing. How the hell do I turn off auto updates or whatever retarded feature this is?
what are you trying to achieve with the bot?
well, it's a bot, you can't have a conversation with it. also, please use a private query (/query ubottu) to test it out, instead of this channel.
